${ModID}:MasterSpark.NAME: Master Spark
${ModID}:MasterSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. ${ModID}:Amplify [E] : NL Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:LuminousStrike.NAME: Luminous Strike
${ModID}:LuminousStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Amplify [E] [E] : Increase damage equal to current energy times !M!.

${ModID}:ShootingEcho.NAME: Shooting Echo
${ModID}:ShootingEcho.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a card to ${ModID}:Duplicate. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StardustReverie.NAME: Stardust Reverie
${ModID}:StardustReverie.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! card. Gain ${ModID}:Charge Up equal to two times its cost including ${ModID}:Amplify.
${ModID}:StardustReverie.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards. Gain ${ModID}:Charge Up equal to two times its cost including ${ModID}:Amplify.

${ModID}:Inertia.NAME: Inertia
${ModID}:Inertia.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted or ${ModID}:Amplified, gain !M! ${ModID}:Charge Up.
